titleStmt.title: A sermon preached in the Savoy, July 11, 1675 by Mr. de Luzancy licentiat in divinity, on the day of his abjuration.
titleStmt.author: De Luzancy, H. C. (Hippolyte du Chastelet), d. 1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, and are to be sold by Moses Pitt ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of author's sermon from the French.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
